playersWelcomeScreen.name: Display Welcome Screen to Players
playersWelcomeScreen.hint: Uncheck to prevent players from seeing Welcome Screen on log in after an update.

showOnVersion.name: Display Welcome Screen on Version Update:
showOnVersion.hint: Choose which type of updates should fire a Welcome screen with patch notes. Same setting will be used for notification icon in the Sidebar. Star represents version parts that will trigger the screen.
